metadata.title: CVE-2021-3476 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in OpenEXR's B44 uncompression functionality in versionsbefore 3.0.0-beta. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted file toOpenEXR could trigger shift overflows, potentially affecting applicationavailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3476` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr25 - 2.5.7-1
openexr - 2.5.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.7-1').
